entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: Assertion failed '!(block->bbFlags & BBF_FINALLY_TARGET)' during 'Global local var liveness' #94680
    9.0.0
  • crossgen2-composite gcstress has lot of failures #94678
  • [wasi] Improve error message for missing WASI SDK #94671
  • How can i get the filed "m_length" of "ILGenerator" ? #94662
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'codeSize <= MAX_PROLOG_SIZE_BYTES' during 'Emit code' #94660
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Share more of the `CustomAttribute` logic between CoreCLR and Mono #94659
    9.0.0
  • Consider enabling EnforceCodeStyleInBuild in runtime to validate IDE rules on build #94658
  • [NativeAOT] App Store Connect warning ITMS-90999: Invalid executable #94655
    9.0.0
  • Task wasn't RunSynchronously with TaskScheduler specified #94653
  • Test failure: _ParallelCrashTester::ParallelCrashTester.ParallelCrashMainThread() #94652
  • Windbg breakpoints on AOT binary induce crash #94650
    Future

Closed

  • [mono][reflection] ArgumentNullException calling `GetCustomAttributes` on user-defined subtype of `ParameterInfo` #94488
    8.0.x
  • {U}Int128 divided by 0 throws wrong exception type #94593
  • FrozenDictionary is incorrectly case sensitive in some cases #93974
    8.0.1
  • [wasm] dotnet.native.wasm was re-generated because the list of .o files in emcc-link.rsp is non-deterministic #93689
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] The way of getting the path of `runtimeconfig.json` file is not always reliable #93692
    9.0.0
  • JsonObjectCreationHandling.Populate and IDictionary<,> #94676
  • Console.WriteLine() is not thread-safe #53751
    Future
  • Let System.ConsoleKeyInfo able to represent keypress in the Unicode world #51085
    Future
  • "System.UnauthorizedAccessException: Access to the path is denied." from Console.WriteLine on Ubuntu 20.10 #48654
    Future
  • JsonTypeInfo.CreateObject is null after custom converter is added to JsonSerializerOptions #94674
  • Console.OpenStandard* few times slower on Linux #31396
    Future
  • MacOS 10.13.6 Console.SetWindowSize() exception #27216
    8.0.0
  • Console.Clear() doesn't clear the scrollback buffer on Unix-like platforms #28355
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add additional parameter to PutAsJsonAsync to control whether to use chunked transfer encoding #94124
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Stackoverflow reporting on Linux #82334
    9.0.0
  • aspnetcore tests having Dynamic.Proxy fails on ppc64le architecture #93770
    8.0.0
  • IlcStandaloneGCSupport Not Working For NativeAoT #94618
  • [API Proposal]: Generic State Parameter for Linq operators #94654
  • Performance Issue with DeserializeAsyncEnumerable on Small JSON Objects Stream #94657
  • Move tests from full facade assemblies into type forward destination #89230
    Future
  • Unify RuntimeType with the shared RuntimeType #91704
    9.0.0
  • WindowsIdentity.RunImpersonated does not achieve TokenAccessLevels.Impersonate #93537
    Future
  • WindowsIdentity.RunImpersonated has issues resolving libraries if the library wasn't already used in the program #91771
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Revert performance optimization resulting in incorrect lookups in certain case insensitive frozen collections #94685
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Collections, 8.0.x
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Enable WasmStripILAfterAOT by default #94682
    area-Build-mono
  • Add support for specifying "experiment name". #94679
    tenet-performance-benchmarks, area-Infrastructure
  • Initial gcdump support #94673
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize SSA #94672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Clean up NYI_RISCV64 in CodeGen and Emitter #94666
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net

Merged

  • FabricBot: Remove project board automation #94626
    area-Meta
  • UInt128: Throw DivideByZeroException when divisor is 0 #94640
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94602
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • Update alpine arm32 in CI #94683
    needs-area-label, 9.0.0
  • Disable optimization which sometimes results in incorrect case sensitivity in FrozenCollections #94667
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use post order computed by SSA in VN #94623
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix all the issues related to enabling WasmStripILAfterAOT #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Proper ordering of run configs (matches dotnet/performance side). #94661
    tenet-performance-benchmarks, area-Infrastructure
  • Implement StoreVectorAndZipNxM for Arm64 #94607
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Disable CodeQL if we're not in the dedicated pipeline for it #94675
    area-Infrastructure
  • Group new test projects under System.Runtime in folders #94670
    needs-area-label
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #94485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94468
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.16
  • Fixes the build when IlcStandaloneGCSupport is specified #94624
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix slngen CoreLib folder #94668
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Improve local assertion prop throughput #94597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] GC coop safepoints #94601
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Reenable runtime-richnav pipeline #94663
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-staging] [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94478
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] catch the case of updated methods in mono_debug_lookup_source_location #94612
    Servicing-approved, area-EnC-mono, 8.0.x
  • Move tests from full facade folder to type forward destination #94644
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Revert "Run Antigen/Fuzzlyn on Saturdays too (#89426)" #94656
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • fixed doc comment copy mistake #94648
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Update slngen and sln files #94645
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow preinitializing RuntimeType instances #94405
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement frozen object heap #94515
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #94492
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94193
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix for a stress crash in ComAwareWeakReferenceNative::HasInteropInfo #94649
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Calculate PackageVersionNet7 #94614
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update NugetProjectModelVersion and NugetPackagingVersion #94613
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Make Deflate/GZip/ZlibStream empty writes have the same impact as no writes #94433
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Add feature switch attribute design doc #94625
    linkable-framework
  • Change several more arrays to be assembly data spans (w/ collection expressions) #93535
    area-System.Runtime
  • Expose ChannelReader.ReadAllAsync from non-core builds as well #94417
    area-System.Threading.Channels
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add generic overloads to TensorPrimitives #94555
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add an additional length check to FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet #92546
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Add AOT compiler build to the official build #92095
    area-Build-mono
  • Simplify surrogate handling logic in WebUtlity #93515
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Add missing readonly modifiers to GCHandle and DependentHandle #93178
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Enable aligned_alloc on macOS #94298
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-mac-os-x, os-ios
  • Add tests for Task.WhenAll #93619
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Update Marshal.QueryInterface() argument modifier (take 2) #94470
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono-debug] refactor access to MonoDebugInformationEnc #94617
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Format usings to match code style #94085
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Handle null signature destinations for ECDsa / DSA / RSA #93996
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • add IO.Ports packaging for linux-musl #92145
    area-System.IO.Ports
  • Implements new `int`and `long` overloads for `TimeSpan` #94143
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94573
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.x
  • Sve: Early versions of Intrinsics/Arm/Sve and hwintrinsiclistarm64sve #94606
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] pool don't yield to event loop #94600
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [draft][browser] Run unit tests on multithreaded runtime with multithreaded xunit runner #91317
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, os-browser
  • Fix: OID's cache poisoning with random values #93661
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Introduce fgDebugCheckTypes #94621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • `JsonSerializerOptions.Web` for `JsonSerializerOptions` #94370
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet tool restore OK, then dotnet toolname says tool is not there, and to restore it #36847
  • Provide an option to prevent trim from removing unused constructors #36835
  • --create-manifest-if-needed for tool manifest behaviour discussion, and the -d option to list location searched doesn't do what it claims #36830
  • Run 'dotnet restore --interactive' against project with custom SDK from private nuget feed won't start authentication process #36824

Closed

  • One click/command line solution for end to end "replace package reference with project reference" #36846
  • Git commit ID included in assembly ProductVersion field when building with sdk 8 #34568
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36842
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 22.1.4 to 22.2.0 in /eng/dependabot #36827
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Merged

  • Bump FakeItEasy from 7.4.0 to 8.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #36826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Updated

  • Simplify and improve signature verification for workloads on Windows #36787
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Freeze Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver assembly version #36733
    untriaged
  • accept bare version as NuGet exact version for .NET tools #36671
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2314446 #36712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36804
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deeply recursive documents cause AbstractSyntaxHelper.ContainsAttributeList to blow the stack #70790
    17.9 P2
  • Disabling responsive completion options in integration tests not effective #70787
  • Exception in CompletionProvider takes down IntelliSense #70786
    Backlog
  • Document outline not working #70785
  • [Bug]: Cannot generate `override` body if method contains parameter of type `nint` or `nuint` on projects targeting frameworks which do not support them natively #70782
  • IDE0251 incorrectly reported when using primary constructors #70780

Closed

  • Incorrect nullable analysis of compound assignment due to double visit of operands #70646
    17.9
  • Compilator can't find the matching overload for operator+ when implementing nullability to project #65546
    17.9
  • Incorrect nullability analysis in compound assignment #29962
    Backlog
  • Special handling for InterpolatedStringHandlerAttribute is causing a hang in C# compiler #68110
    17.9
  • Tracking issue to ensure any mitigations we make for out of sync source-generators get removed. #69964
  • Raw multiline string literal doesn't show indentation line if closing """ isn't in viewport #67821
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Make eng/build.sh --test run more unit tests #70793
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Remove recursion in ForAttributeWithMetadataName #70791
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Only show argument completion items when method accepts arguments #70789
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Perform less cross process calls when computing 'Nav To' results. #70788
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP2 #70783
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix 'make member readonly' with mutation of primary constructor parameters #70781
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Syntax classification improvement #70772
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Revise compound assignment for nullable #70687
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Break some binding cycles #70759
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move keepalive code inwards #70784
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [Performance] Reduce allocations in `PENamedTypeSymbol.EnsureTypeParametersAreLoaded` #70766
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Enc: Clean up SemanticEdit #70449
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue with raw-string-indentation tag not being drawn if end of string is offscreen #70778
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [Performance]: Cache last PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers result when the result is a namespace #70767
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add nested code actions to csharp extension #70475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation support #70650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Handle satellite assembly loading in .NET Core #70769
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Create params arrays during binding #70762
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP #70714
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow analyzer exceptions to fall through if desired #70729
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix for source generator diagnostics not showing up as part of live analysis when generators run in OOP #70715
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HttpContext could not be found #52029
  • Perf regression: plaintext #52028
  • Perf improvement: https #52027
  • WebApplicationBuilder doesn't automatically add the antiforgery middleware #52026
  • Request timeouts are not applied without the middleware, no error given #52025
  • Blazor enhanced form using wrong default enctype #52024
    8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Recommended actions for upgrading across major Blazor versions #52022
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • Blazor form should not be enhanced when target attribute is different than the default #52020
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor button formenctype attribute #52019
    8.0.x
  • Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor enctype form attribute #52018
    8.0.x
  • Uncaught error when submitting enhanced form with method="dialog" #52017
    Planning: WebUI
  • Duplicate Route Name #52008
  • Blazor global state one way binding. #52007
    Backlog
  • IncludeHttpRuleProtos not working if not reference Microsoft.AspNetCore.Grpc.JsonTranscoding directly #52006
  • Update QuickGrid virtualization sample to remove TODO to use @bind:after #52004
    Planning: WebUI

Closed

  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #52005
  • blazor hybrid wpf, which supports blazor programs in the new wpf window, and routing #52003
  • [Blazor] Append a version query string to "_framework/blazor.web.js" and "_framework/blazor.webassembly.js" in the templates #52021
  • I have glopalbusinesspay in said fund #52015
  • Updating published Blazor WebAssembly application from .NET 7 to .NET8 preview crashes with: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'dotnet.wasm') #51268
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • InputFile in Blazor SSR #51980
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #52000

PullRequests

Merged

  • Automatically comment when `help wanted` label is added #52002
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Fix construction of AsParameters with default constructor #51637
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0.1

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Use working directory as relative directory for project file resolution #51974
    Servicing-approved, area-commandlinetools, 8.0.x
  • Un-quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETests.ServerRenderingTests.InteractivityTest.AutoRenderMode_UsesBlazorServerOnFirstLoad_ThenWebAssemblyOnSuccessiveLoads` #51887
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Allow user to specify antiforgery request token source #51962
    community-contribution, feature-mvc-antiforgery, area-ui-rendering
  • [DO NOT MERGE PLEASE] Validate install-scripts changes #51889
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • 47569 - Using FrozenDictionary in HttpMethodDictionaryPolicyJumpTable #51803
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet dump analyze's `gcroot <address>` crashes on arm64 #4388
    9.0.0
  • gcdump/dump: Process not running compatible .NET runtime #4390
  • Make async overloads of DiagnosticsClient public #3727
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Make DiagnosticsClient.StartEventPipeSessionAsync public #4394

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Regression][Android] Setting the background property of AppCompatEditText in a handler mapping does not work #18720
  • [iOS] [SDK 17] Touch events are not working on WebView when a PDF is displayed. #18716
  • Loaded and Unloaded events are not raised for Maui views in Native Embedding #18714
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D24 #18712
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D22 #18711
    .NET 8 SR1
  • When create and running a new .net MAUI Blazor Hybrid App only show the blue background #18707
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D14 #18706
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Borders border looks unsharp and thickness varies across platforms #18705
  • XamlC ignores isError option in ObsoleteAttribute #18704
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D13 #18703
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Defining CollectionView GroupFooterTemplate crashes the app #18702
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Label style defined as ContentPage Resource doesn't propagate to CollectionView #18701
    Backlog
  • [Windows] CollectionView GroupHeader doesn't fill space horizontaly #18700
    Backlog
  • [Windows] CollectionView GroupHeader has arbitrary spacing #18699
    Backlog
  • Change from 7.0: Image no longer fits container #18698
    .NET 8 SR2

Closed

  • Splash screen icon shrink when using State Manager on iPad #15175
  • Scroll does not work on Mac (Mac Catalyst) #15310
  • [Windows] How to style the ScrollBar of the ScrollView #18101
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D4 #18647
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [iOS, Mac] The editor placeholder can't able to changed, It's default placed at center #18282
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Scrollview shifts content down when a subview element visibility changes (after scrolling). #18513
    .NET 8 SR1

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Android 14.0 or API 34 to the test matrix #18721
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `TableView` #18718
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D24 #18713
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D14 #18709
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

Merged

  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Frame`, `VisualElementRenderer` #18552
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D4 #18650
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Slider` #18681
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Switch` #18682
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fixed Editor placeholder position based on alignment #18672
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-editor
  • Arrange content based on arrangement bounds rather than viewport bounds #18586
    area/layout 🔲

Updated

  • Only use custom image sizing with ImageButtons #18521
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix broadcast receiver register on android 14.0/34+ #18520
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Android] Fix Flyout toolbar #18684
  • [WinUI] Fix resizing CV rows when content size changed #18553
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • [testing] Run tests on device #17808
    area/testing
  • [Catalyst] Allow to use a custom WKUIDelegate on WebView #18483
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Fix margin on title bar #17729
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR1
  • set the parents to installer #18086
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, .NET 8 SR1
  • Invalidate Shapes BackgroundColor #18183
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 8 SR1
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [ios] update MemoryAnalyzers and cleanup #18449
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • [C] Lowest specificity for propagated values #17648
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D11 #18676
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [C] implicit style VSM do not override Manual value #18680
  • [Android] Avoid possible crash using essentials Battery #18386
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D12 #18677
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Core remapping alternate take #18635

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NRE when adding entity with an owned entity and `ToJson` configuration #32288
  • ToSchema() extension #32286
  • Oracle Index create and drop problem with efcore codefirst #32284

Closed

  • SQL Server Migrations: Review temporal table annotations #27459
    MQ
  • EF Core IsTemporal() creates huge migration #29536
    9.0.0
  • EF7 SqlServer Migration is trying to update columns on History table before creating the History table if any new columns are added in the same migration #29799
    9.0.0
  • ApplyConfigurationsFromAssembly is ordering config by class FullName instead by dependencies #32273
  • SqlNullabilityProcessor ignores Contains item visitation #32208
    8.0.x
  • A Question about DbContextPooling and RowLevelSecurity #32275

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.59.0 #32287
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/8.0] Stop throwing for complex type properties when sensitive data logging is on #32285
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Temporal table migrations refactor. #32239
  • [release/8.0] Visit arguments in QueryableMethodNormalizingExpressionVisitor after converting List.Contains (#32219) #32266
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Contains nullability processing #32265
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #32235 - Buffering error in JSON deserialization with junk data #32253
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-13
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • After installing the latest .Net 9.0 SDK version, the target is still 8.0 when creating Winforms applications via CLI #17744

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
  • The .NET 8 SDK installer recommends Visual Studio 17.7 when it should recommend 17.8 #17770

PullRequests

Merged

  • Enabling MSI builds targeting net9 #17768
  • Add Alpine leg based on MS SDK for VMR #17769
  • Ensure we propagate DotNetBuildVertical property to source-built projects #17767
  • Update prebuilts package version to 9.0.100-4 #17763

Updated

  • Consume portable RID graph from runtime #17760
  • Fix the minimum version logic to take into account that we're off-by-one for the 100 release #17761
    Servicing-consider
  • Disable crossgen and zip file creation in the local dev build unless -pack is used #17478
  • [release/8.0.2xx] NGEN Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver.dll and its dependencies #17750
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #17753
